metadata.title: USN-5988-1 -- Xcftools vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that integer overflows vulnerabilities existed in Xcftools. An attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2019-5086, CVE-2019-5087)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5988-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  xcftools - 1.0.7-6ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
